saveToFiles() - Method in class wikicategory.WikiCategory
calls saveToFiles with targetDir set to current directory and suffix set to "".
saveToFiles(String) - Method in class wikicategory.WikiCategory
calls saveToFiles with targetDir set to current directory/wiki and suffix set to fileSuffix.
saveToFiles(File, String) - Method in class wikicategory.WikiCategory
After calling run you can call this function to save retrieved pages to files in disk
